Honestly the only times Yasuo is an issue nowadays for me is when the mid laner somehow feeds the ever-loving hell out of him.

Like, they have no right to complain about how tanky he is later on. He isn't naturally unkillable, **YOU** did this.
Said it as a joke. TBH I do not think Yasuo is OP, but he is annoying AF and I simply enjoy the game more without him
